TopicTitle: New to the Game? Need a Guide?

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I am producing a complete beginners guide to the career mode and releasing the videos on youtube.

If you are stuck and need some help, please contact me and watch the videos!

First release is https://youtu.be/1OcRaDBUQwc

Hope it helps someone!

RedneckEinstein

You go, Mathew! Smooth and steady talk, easy to understand.

My introduction to KSP would've been way easier if I had watched this by the time. Keep up with the good work.

Here, have some rep.

You go, Mathew! Smooth and steady talk, easy to understand.

My introduction to KSP would've been way easier if I had watched this by the time. Keep up with the good work.

Here, have some rep.

Hey thanks! So nice to have some positive feedback!

I have episodes 1,2, and 3 uploaded now for your viewing, plus a new episode each day!

Episode 1: https://youtu.be/1OcRaDBUQwc

Episode 2: https://youtu.be/AK2wM0SXu2M

Episode 3: https://youtu.be/5F5nzJV4yD0

Thanks again!!

Hi guys, a quick update,

Episode 4 is now live on youtube and we continue to gather our research points to unlock more parts for our rockets!

https://youtu.be/DOVv_1eJYiY

Happy Kerbaling!

Hello fellow Kerbanauts just to let you know episode 5 is up and running on youtube and i would veyr much appreciate your feedback!

http://youtu.be/0fjFd70A7Ts
